name: Mr. Bones XMas Delivery Service
description:
Help deliver gifts to children across town! Play as Mr. Bones with his magical gift-giving broomstick. Follow the arrow to find the next tree to deliver presents to. Each present delivered gives extra time, try to deliver as many as you can!

Controls:

W/S & A/D - Move forward/backward & Move left/right

Space/LeftCtrl - Lift up/go down

Q/E - Tilt Left/Right

LeftShift or RightClick - Boost

LeftClick or F - Throw gift

Created using Unity
